title: Chuck Ragan Tour Dates
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {44864=In other news, Pabst stock just jumped 600%. Oct 16th seems like forever away. Thankfully I get to see American Steel in a couple days., 43426=november 1st and 2nd.. shall be a drunken weekend in so cal.., 21789=october 13th!, 29012=October 17th is waaaaay too long to wait for this., 36970=Ill be there Oct 22 or 23. I cant decide whether to go the the Aggie or the Marquis. A little bummed Tom mGabel isn't on either of those days..., 40048=July 19th! If I can make it work, I'm going. Yes!, 54613=nov second! i am flying there from boise!, 51252=also october 12th is nofx and d4 in nyc. as busy as a weekend as next weekend is., 65989=They better stop in Cleveland on October 6th., 16547=Oct. 9 with bells on., 28377=Come on, Oct. 21st in Omaha. Christ, it is on the way to Fort Collins. Why play Sioux Falls and not Omaha? This show would be epic at the Slowdown (well pretty much anywhere). Why did it have to be during the week? Now I gotta miss a day of work., 80635=SUNDOWNER will be performing live at Howard's Club H in Bowling Green, Ohio on Weds. Oct 15th doors @ 9pm venue address: 210 N. Main St. Bowling Green, Ohio 43402 all ages $6 for 21+/$8 for under 21 ***NOTE: GET THERE EARLY SUNDOWNER WILL BE GOING ON 2nd*** + 3 local supporting acoustic acts hope to see you all there. -alex. goto myspace.com/shakinpromotions for additional info, 23566=i already have a pair of comp tickets and will be giving out two pairs on my radio show come october. *shameless self promotion*, 24760=i really wish they were playing baltimore and not dc. oh well. oct 14th!}
textBeforeTable: Bristle Ridge. The musicians who participated in that recording will perform the work on a special show in St. Augustine, FL on July 5th. They'll be supporting the Old Crow Medicine Show at the St. Augustine Amphitheater. A number of dates will also feature Austin Lucas, which which Ragan recorded the upcoming album Lawrence Arms. Jesse Malin of D Generation and Chris McCaughan of the Drag The River, 7Seconds, John Snodgrass of The Draft, Kevin Seconds of Hot Water Music / Against Me!, Chris Wollard of Lucero. The tour will feature the three frontmen playing solo sets and collaborating on each other's material. A number of notable punk frontmen will join the trio on select dates, with appearances planned by Tom Gabel of Avail and Ben Nichols of Tim Barry of Hot Water Music, Chuck Ragan of Revival Tour, featuring SideOneDummy Records has announced the dates for the upcoming (EDT) Saturday, July 5, 2008 at 12:00 PM adam on Contributed by mattramone. Posted by Tours: Chuck Ragan / Tim Barry / Ben Nichols “Revival Tour” Login
